title: Pixel 3 cpu monitor question
content:
Hi,
So I was wondering for pixel 3 how many energy sensors are there for the cpu energy monitoring on the motherboard?
I know that for snapdragon 845 there are 4 2.5GhZ cores and 4 1.6 GhZ cores, so I was wondering on the motherboard if there arehttps://support.google.com/pixelphone/answer/7158570?hl=en 8 energy sensors for each cpu core or there are only 2 sensors which is for per clusters?
Thank you!
